column5: Kev.... whats up with the shirt sharing  :blink:    man.... you guys are weird   :lol:  J/K  Great job on the gators Thanks for sharing Jacques

FILA actually made a collection of shirts with "goo"  on the front.  It is called the plumber's pattern and all the east end cockney geezers are wearing them in London England.  I want you to Bust that myth.  lol. nice pike
no comment on the sweatshirt....but you guys sure have some good fishing in your area,thanks for sharing.

OK for years me and paul have been telling people.  This is a MyTH DUMB DUMBS!  This is the original Siamese pike that went WORLD WIDE.    EVERY site says its a true 2 bodied pike....  Or is it realy.   take 2 pike.    Shove small pike into larger pikes GILL.  BADABING BADABOOM!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!      IV CAUGHT A FREAK OF NATURE! :x  :shock:  Incredible what people will believe!  Now the story behind how these pike were caught!  We start the day @ 8 am.  Dead calm water.....  Pike are still on shore and in the salad bars.(in lakes)  cast out the Famous S-B.  Set the hook hard cause the fish were bitting LIGHT.  just sticking there nose in the spinner baits buisness.!  GO EM!      Release the Gator.     Cast once Cast twice.  Hit the shore .  This one is 1.2 inches from shore.    just got a action shot of this one he jumped and Gator spin then BYE BYE SIR OLD GATOR!  Buzzbait isnt always the lure of choice this time of the year  but in small lakes were the water is hotter.  They will give you the ride of you life.  I cast the B-BAIT. in lilly pads and this one was ready to hit.!      Black B-B #1 on my list.  Then its my GOOD OL' PALS turn.  FISH ON!    a nice rocket! 8)    Fished from 8 till 11  then went for some good old poutine!  then from 1 to 2 pm and called it a day.  this is a verry small lake so 5-6 full rounds and most of the fish are spooked or nailed you lure.  kept two 4-5 lbs pike for super!    SOOOO the next time someone shows you this pictures and says ITS REAL ITS REAL.  show him this report .  just the proper way to SHUT HIM UP!
Go Team FILA  Cheers  Craig

sorry to burst your bubble but I'm pretty sure that "myth" was disproved a LONG time ago...actually I would have thought it hard to even find someone (at least any fisherperson) who still (or ever) believed it
Oh yeah thanks for the correction.  sadly it was republished in a fishing mag i read and im getting sick of seeing this picture.  what a stupid myth.
Winds from the North............do not go forth.    nice pike report!!! Thanks
some folk have way too much time on their hands!!
nice fish....  maybe botbot and I should invite you two along to show us how to fish for them too  ...lol
the best thing about this myth was that i got it in emails where it was supposedly caught in totally different geographical areas...as if the myth wasn't bad enough on it's own.

i cant believe this Myth is still traveling on the emails.   too much time on my hands.  i think not sir took me 2 seconds to do this.  the first guy that did this is a famous looser.  how can you lie about a stupid thing like that.  anyways.  thanx for the great replies guys!
Thank you!!!!!!!!

It's not really any of my business...but is there some reason why you and your chum appear to be wearing the same shirt?  Secondly, the first photo...the one we all got in our E-mail (while obviously fake) looks a lot more convincing than the one you took.  I'm not saying one is genuine and one is not, but the photos you staged look like two pike with their heads touching and not some sort of one-headed/two-bodied mutant.  IMO.

... and what's that gooey-sticky-messy lookin' stuff all over the front of it??? ... did y'all swap it out to eat icecream cones?... or did someone blow a Seal???   Great report and some real nice lookin' Poikes y'all have there!!!
nice pike report! the picture would look better if the pike under the gill plat were turned slightly more to the same profile as the first pike. Either way, thanks for proving it !
Nice pike.....I can hardly wait to hear the reply about sharing the same Fila shirt and what's all over it!!
Yall talking about the shirt!   the stuff all over .  im a plumber figure it out.  if you cant .  your just not right in your mind.
Hey Kevin......but why do you both have the same shirt on in those pics with the exact "stuff" all over it in the exact same location???????????????

Now it ain't up to me to cast a stone but....... I'm a plumber and I have never had white stuff on my shirt that looks like the goo on yours.....  lol  Want to take a stab at dispelling the goo myth again?  Art
So let me get this strait,your plumber Your specialty is un-blocking pipes!  Your fishing with your buddy and share the same shirt Looks like the pipe got un-clogged now!
Who unclogged who's pipe?.....................  Yer not right in your mind there Marc....

Well that explains it!... all the plumbers I've ever known have been notorious Seal Blowers!!!   Pm Daplumma or Aplumma, I think I heard one ogf them say they always wear a Lobster Bib when they know they're gonna blow a Seal... maybe they can tell you a cheap place to buy them... I think Aplumma buys them by the gross...

DARN you guys are ILL!  Yeah you need a color blind test SON.  if your a plumber and you didnt recongized the A.B.S glue than you Failed carrer wise.  and if you never got that crap on your self then you take your time therefor beeing to slow so you fired.     Guys havent you ever shared a sweat shirt..........between friends?
I woulda fired ya for waisting so much glue.....................
